dict.acceptation: 先生；绅士；有身份地位的人；

sent.orig: Gentleman, gentleman, please give me a bread, thanks, I hungrilyresult am not good.
sent.trans: 先生，先生，请给我些面包，谢谢，我饿得不行了。

sent.orig: Once a gentleman, and always a gentleman.
sent.trans: 一日为绅士，终身为绅士。

sent.orig: A gentleman will do like a gentleman.
Gentleman will do like a gentleman.
Thank a gentleman to need a person very amiable and courteous.
sent.trans: 谢先生待人很和气谦恭。
